sect2.title: Introduction to qt using objprelink
sect2.para: This section covers a very specialized compile of qt which dramatically decreases the load time for kde desktop programs. It is also known not to work under some conditions and will produce segfaults instead of faster load times. The details of prelinking are discussed at . When you feel comfortable with the risks and rewards, proceed to the installation section.
sect2.screen: qt using objprelink depends on: , , , , , and
